description: Elegant flowers with a sleek modern look, easy to maintain indoors.
A cute heart-shaped succulent, perfect for desks and small spaces.
Believed to bring good luck and fortune, great for home and office.
Beautiful white blooms and strong air-purifying qualities.
Unique red-veined leaves that fold at night like praying hands.
Also known as Snake Plant, very hardy and low maintenance.
Fast-growing, easy-care plant with long arching leaves.
Extremely tough plant with shiny green leaves, thrives on neglect.
